pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient and accurate P-value computation for Position Weight Matrices. // TFMPvalue provides the accurate calculation of P-value with score threshold for Position Weight Matrices, or the score with given P-value. This package is an interface to code originally made available by Helene Touzet and Jean- Stephane Varre, 2007, Algorithms Mol Biol:2, 15.
